subtasks: Stand in the garden and introduce the garlic harvest.
Hold and show the Romanian red garlic bulb.
Describe the garlic's characteristics, such as its heat and flavor.
Explain the anatomy of the garlic, including the bulb and roots.
Point out the hard neck of the garlic.
Highlight the presence of leaves and scapes (removable stems).
Discuss the uses of scapes in cooking.
Demonstrate cutting the scapes from the garlic plant.
Explain the curing process for the garlic.
Describe the location and setup for the garlic curing process.
Showcase the use of a plastic fence to hang the garlic for curing.
Discuss the importance of shade and airflow during curing.
Show the initial steps of hanging the garlic by weaving the leaves through the fence.
Demonstrate the duration of the curing process (two weeks).
Mention the return visit for checking the cured garlic in two weeks.
Provide contact information and encourage audience engagement.
